GRoup Events
In Rockledge, FL
book an event to remember!
Fill out this brief questionnaire and our events manager will contact you with our group attraction packages and food/beverage options!
Name
Phone
Email
Company/Organization
Date
Type of event
Duration
Will you be needing a private room?
Yes, we need a private room!
No thanks!
What attractions are you most interested in?
Go-karts
Krazy Darts (Adults)
Axe throwing
Laser tag
Zip zag
Ninja course
Ropes course
mini-bowling
XD dark ride theater
Arcade
Are you looking for food inclusions?
Yes please!
No thanks!
Group size
Message
How did you hear about us?
Please select an option from the list
Instagram
Facebook
Google
Awesome friends
Our awesome staff
Had a fantastic event here before
I understand my data is being collected and will not be shared.
Send It
Can’t find what you need? Get in touch for more options!
A $100 booking deposit will be collected at the time of reservation to secure the group rate, date, and time. the event booking is confirmed only upon retrieval of the deposit.
Prices and packages are subject to change seasonally and at the company’s discretion
Call for details
(321) 978-7223
Request info
info@route7entertainment.com
Route 7 by far is the best family entertainment establishment to touch brevard county, I would suggest the family to plan a visit they have attractions for ALL ages and the staff is just ahhhhhhhhhhmazinggggg!!!!! I can’t wait to go back it’s to much to say in words just trust me and visit yourself don’t let anyone make you not want to see for yourself you will be missing out!
Max
Google Review
Had an awesome time and highly recommend their parties for young and young at heart. My teens had a great time. The GM Jenna made sure our experience was top notch. The attractions were a blast.  The private room was clean and the food was delicious . Paul was a pleasure and had everyone laughing. Their packages were fairly priced and had several different options for  any budget. Can't wait to take the kids to check out the e games.
Sara
Google Review
The Route 7 team represents among the highest levels of customer service I have experienced!
The team members are really informed and go the extra mile at everything they do. My husband and I came for a fun loving date night and had a complete BLAST! The service we received was so amazing and we will definitely be back again to compete on all of the games again! They made us feel welcomed and gave us an amazing experience! We are so fortunate to have this place just a few minutes drive away from home, there’s nothing like it on the Space Coast!
Jessica
Google Review
Attention!
A friendly reminder that no outside food and beverages are allowed into our facility. Ask us about our catering options!
Available for groups of 10 participating guests or more.
All group and corporate events must be made through our Events Department at events@route7entertainment.com.
facility rental options are available upon request.

about us
Route 7 Karting & Entertainment is a premiere family entertainment center located in Florida’s iconic Space Coast. Our 60,000 square foot facility in the historic FLORIDA TODAY building was intricately curated with one thing in mind: total, absolute, and mind-blowing FUN.
The vision for Route 7 Karting & Entertainment is to be a venue where we can serve families, friends, and our community by creating unforgettable experiences through world-class attractions and impeccable service.
From our family to yours, we are excited to share what we have built with YOU – so come check us out, we’re pretty sure you’ll like it.
We can’t wait to meet you!
Have fun with friends!
Check out our special group rates!
Book now
